name: MOD
description: The MOD class provides functionality for working with Python modules in TouchDesigner, including loading, reloading, and accessing module contents.

methods.name: addMonths
methods.description: import datNameImport the module defined by the DAT named datName. All regular import options are supported (from, as, etc). If a DAT is not found, the regular file system search path is then used.# import a DAT named addMonth

methods.name: m = mod
methods.description: import datNameImport the module defined by the DAT named datName. All regular import options are supported (from, as, etc). If a DAT is not found, the regular file system search path is then used.# import a DAT named addMonth
